column1: '''''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''. It has 13 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 182 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements.
[[File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey - Extended Edition - DVD cover.jpg
The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentary:

NOTE: The film is split over 2 discs for both the DVD and Blu-ray 3-D editions; the breaking point coming between chapters 20 & 21 (the Blu-ray 3-D edition also contains the regular 2-D Blu-ray version of the film as disc 3).
==The Appendices: Part Seven - A Long-Expected Journey: The Chronicles of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' - Part 1 (disc 2)**==
